weka.dl4j.lossfunctions

Class LossPoisson

  • java.lang.Object

    public class LossPoisson
extends org.nd4j.linalg.lossfunctions.impl.LossPoisson
implements OptionHandler
    A version of DeepLearning4j's LossPoisson that implements WEKA option handling.
